metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4654 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: poppler before 0.16.3 has malformed commands that may cause corruption of the internal stack.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> first patch may change API/ABI first patch is for protection, second patch actually fixes particular issue. Second patch is included in Lucid's poppler, so we're not affected.

criterions.comment: ipe: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
libextractor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
xpdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
